name: Carrol Higgins
bio: Owner of Carrol's Comics. She really doesn't understand the hobby but opened the store after the passing of her husband. She has a cat who is a fixture of the store. She has a bit of a green thumb.

name: Colonel Marcus Hensley
bio: Colonel Hensley is the commander of the local base. He is known for his tough demeanor and intense gaze.

name: Darnell Mantell
bio: The late science teacher in Dexter was loved by the community, known for leading his students to state championships in science Olympiads. He is well-loved by the community for his dedication and passion.

name: Dorris Macintosh
bio: A warm constant presence at the local library. She has a passion for local history and often teaches free English and Spanish classes.

name: Hal Bogle
bio: Local rich guy with deep connections to the nearby military base. His family has been here for a few generations, and he is not shy about throwing around his influence.

name: Luiz Adams
bio: Often found asleep in his police cruiser, Deputy Adams is a bit aloof but a jolly fellow.

name: Molly Hopper
bio: Third-generation sheriff. She is intelligent and intense, a sharp investigator with a firm but fair view of the law.

name: Vic Pollard
bio: Owner of Vic's Garage. He is an Army vet, motorcycle enthusiast, and huge ZZ Top fan. Quick to help most people with his mechanical knowledge.

name: Zara and Emil Allsup
bio: Zara Allsup and her husband Emil are high school sweethearts from Phoenix who moved to Dexter a few years back, taking over a rundown Texaco and turning it into a family business.
